snippet: Among the offerings, apps in which you can speak to your watch to update to-do lists or get a quick assist on deciphering a foreign language.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights new apps for Apple Watch.

headline.main: More Fun on Your Wrist With New Apps for the Apple Watch
headline.print_headline: More Fun on Your Wrist With New Apps for the Apple Watch

snippet: Extended videos, with their cameos and high production values, are part of a growing music streaming war.
abstract: Drake releases 22-minute music video Please Forgive Me, becoming latest pop star trying to reach high artistic bar set by Beyonce with her 'visual album' Lemonade.

headline.main: Beyoncé Raised the Bar With ‘Lemonade.’ Now Others Are Leaping, Too.
headline.print_headline: After Beyoncé Sets the Bar, Others Jump

snippet: The books that gave us "Game of Thrones" are getting an enhancement for the digital age.

headline.main: 'Game of Thrones' Books Getting a Digital Enhancement

snippet: Mary J. Blige said she decided to sing Bruce Springsteen's "American Skin (41 Shots)" to Hillary Clinton during her recent interview because she was trying to get the Democratic presidential nominee to feel and understand the widening frustration ...

headline.main: Mary J. Blige Explains Why She Sang to Clinton During Talk
headline.print_headline: Mary J. Blige Explains Why She Sang to Clinton During Talk

snippet: Terrance Brennan will cook at “Celebrate Our Love of the Hudson Valley” ahead of his new restaurant opening.

headline.main: Harvest Lunch to Celebrate Hudson Valley

snippet: Wall Street dropped on Thursday, weighed down by Apple as well as selling in Wells Fargo, Citigroup and other major banks as investors worried about the health of Deutsche Bank.

headline.main: Wall Street Falls Sharply on Worries About Banks
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Falls Sharply on Worries About Banks

snippet: Federal regulators delayed a decision Thursday on requiring cable and satellite TV companies to make free apps to eliminate the need for cable boxes.

headline.main: FCC Delays Vote on Much-Disputed Rules on Cable Boxes
headline.print_headline: FCC Delays Vote on Much-Disputed Rules on Cable Boxes

snippet: Ford Motor Co will become less capital intensive and will be open to partnerships as it develops new businesses such as ride sharing and autonomous vehicles, Chairman Bill Ford said on Thursday.

headline.main: Bill Ford Says Governments Need to Be Involved as Transport Changes
headline.print_headline: Bill Ford Says Governments Need to Be Involved as Transport Changes

snippet: NXP Semiconductors NV is exploring selling itself to Qualcomm Inc in a deal that could be valued at more than $30 billion, two sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.

headline.main: NXP Semiconductors Explores Sale to Qualcomm: Sources
headline.print_headline: NXP Semiconductors Explores Sale to Qualcomm: Sources

snippet: Silicon Valley online education platform Udacity has already received more than 11,000 applicants for its so-called nanodegree in self-driving car engineering, Udacity president and Google X founder Sebastian Thrun said.

headline.main: Udacity's Self-Driving Car Engineering Degree Lures Over 11,000 Hopefuls
headline.print_headline: Udacity's Self-Driving Car Engineering Degree Lures Over 11,000 Hopefuls
